scripts.phpunit: composer install && composer install --working-dir=tools && tools/vendor/bin/phpunit --testdox --coverage-html coverege_report
scripts.phpstan: composer install && composer install --working-dir=tools && tools/vendor/bin/phpstan analyse
scripts.phpstan-github: composer install --quiet --no-progress && composer install --quiet --no-progress --working-dir=tools && tools/vendor/bin/phpstan analyse --no-progress
scripts.csfixer: composer install && composer install --working-dir=tools && tools/vendor/bin/php-cs-fixer fix
scripts.csfixer-github: composer install --quiet --no-progress && composer install --quiet --no-progress --working-dir=tools && tools/vendor/bin/php-cs-fixer check --show-progress=none
